articles.title: Hulk Hogan pays his respects to The Iron Sheik - Cageside Seats
articles.description: Sheik never shied away from letting the world know what he thought of the Hulkster. After his death earlier this week, Hogan focuses on the positives from their professional relationship while saying his public goodbye.
